name: hogtie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to fasten someone's hands and feet together, or to fasten all four legs of an animal together: He was hogtied like a gutted deer.
to make it difficult or impossible for someone to do something: Prodi's government was hogtied from the outset by its tiny majority in the Senate.
